name: Informatics Outsourcing
tag_list: kpo, bpo, informatic-outsource, healthcare, data-management, business-research, qualitative-market-research, quantitative-market-research, statistical-services, software-engineering-services, clinical-research, biostatistics, medical-content-publishing
overview:
Informatics Outsourcing is a marketing web portal of BrainWave Biosolutions Ltd . Informatics Outsourcing provides professional services that cater to the outsourcing needs of various industries around the globe. The services span different aspects of knowledge and Business Process Outsourcing Solutions. We have a team of well experienced professionals who bring in specialized capabilities to handle the wide spectrum of service industry.

Our accomplished researchers and analysts provide immeasurable reasons for customers around the globe to utilize our offerings. Our services can be utilized to handle multitude of complex computational challenges faced by Pharmaceutical Companies, Biotechnological Companies, Healthcare Companies and Research Institutions . The Informatics Outsourcing knowledge management team encompasses PhD level statisticians, MSc level analysts, Graduates in Management and IT professionals to provide clients wide-ranging solutions.

Our Global Offshore Services: Data Management Services, Business Research Services, Quantitative Market Research, Software Engineering Services, Health Care and Clinical Research, Scientific Medical Content, Pharmaceutic and Biotechnology, Quick KPO Services, Key Opinion Leader Profiling, Key Opinion Leader Ranking, Secondary Market Research, Internet search, Web search, Web search-process automation, Contacts Information Mining, Form Filling, XML conversion, HTML conversion, Copy editing and technical editing, e-publishing, Content Writing, Clinical data analysis, Parametric or Non Parametric Tests, Multivariate techniques, Conjoint analysis, Segmentation analysis, Cluster analysis, Perceptual Mapping, Factor analysis, Data Analysis and Report Writing, Perl or Java scripts, Software tools development, data entry, bpo services, LPO services and etc.
